website_summaries.verdict: A good rake designed for lighter-duty garden work. If you use this tool the way it's intended, it won't let you down.
pros: Constructed using a steel ferrule to secure the 14-tine tempered-steel head to the solid wood handle
Works well for loosening and spreading soil
cons: Some reports of rake breaking within minutes

customer_reviews.title: Fell Apart Almost Immediately--Totally Useless
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't like to write reviews, and when I do it's usually because something is great. But I have to say that this rake was a huge waste of money. It fell apart when I was just halfway through gently loosening the soil in my tiny yard so I could put down grass seed. I tried to put it back together but that was pointless.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Please don't waste your money. I bought this rake to spread some top soil through my garden boxes. Within half a day of pushing/pulling loose soil, the end came off. Eventually, after multiple attempts to reattach, the wooden handle splintered where the shaft met the metal portion of the rake. This rake is one of the worst purchases I have made from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: The handle is shorter than I would like but it's probably the exact length that they advertised
customer_reviews.text: The head of the rake came off the first day I used it. I have reattached it several times but it keeps coming back off. The handle is shorter than I would like but it's probably the exact length that they advertised. Wouldn't recommend. Next time I'll spend more to get one that will actually work more than an hour.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product to anyone
customer_reviews.text: The rake broke within FIVE MINUTES of using it on relatively loose soil. The wood cracked where the head meets it and it is now worthless. I would not recommend this product to anyone. In fact, I would advise against it completely.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great metal rake, helpful to dethatch a stubborn lawn
customer_reviews.text: This rake is solidly constructed that was very helpful for dethatching a stubborn back yard. I didn't experience the pole separating from the actual rake itself, like some other reviewers mentioned, despite heavy use. The only downside, which wasn't enough to negatively impact the stars, was that the glue that attaches the rake grip to the actual rake handle was visible on the rake in a small drip. It's easily removable if that bothers you.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great smaller rake
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a very well constructed SMALLER metal rake; ideal for smaller gardens. Other reviewers were correct, it doesn't have a bolt through the handle, but it seems well constructed nonetheless. By the way, in my recent experience, Big Box stores are MUCH MORE than purchasing this from Amazon! I liked the look of real wood (instead of a fiberglass handle); the finish is darker.
customer_reviews.author: craigery

customer_reviews.title: Falls apart at welds
customer_reviews.text: Spot welded, not for regular work in the garden. Possibly for occasional light duty, but that's not what it says in description. Not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Rake, Rake, Baby!
customer_reviews.text: Really strong. The only downside is my mom keeps making me rake the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Rake
customer_reviews.text: Great quality rake. Heavy duty and I received it pretty quick.
customer_reviews.author: M Sammis

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cheap cheap construction!
customer_reviews.text: Do not waste your money on this item ! Broke the first day ! Total crap ! Must be made in China ! & cheap cheap cheap ! I should have read the reviews first ! It is literally glued together at the bottom with what looks like Elmer’s glue ! Do not buy this item . I’m sure I won’t be able to return it as it wasn’t prime ! Another big mistake !
customer_reviews.author: Alden G.

customer_reviews.title: very happy with this Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got some use this Summer with this, very happy with this Purchase, came in Packaged very nice nothing broken or bent,and it is still this way after the abuse I put it through.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Product is as described . It worked perfetly for my needs. I would suggest the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use feels good in your hands!
customer_reviews.text: I really was surprised at the quality of this rake. It is sturdy, lightweight and easy to hold. It is a little smaller than i anticipated but works well none the less. I bought it to help in cleaning my pond and it is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: gramawesome

customer_reviews.title: The children love to use this tool
customer_reviews.text: This tool has made such a difference in our school garden. The children love to use this tool.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great rakes for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these rakes two years ago because I thought that at the super low price, they would not last very long. I was wrong. I have given them pretty hard use over the past two years and they have performed very well and it looks like I will get much more use from them. Don't get me wrong, there are heavier rakes out there, but for the money, you just can't beat these.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck1545

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst rake I have ever used! 1st one broke in 10 minutes just raking small stones... The 2nd lasted 20 minutes wow what an improvement! The metal rake section is just glued in to the handle with which looks like craft glue.
customer_reviews.author: Dunia Izquierdo

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Unless you're planning to purchase this as a decoration, do not buy. This thing is poorly manufactured. They spot weld the head to the sides.... you can find better manufacturing in children's gardening tools. Broke apart 3 days after receiving from only light use.
customer_reviews.author: Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: Rake head fell off when raking through long grass. It looks like it was just held on by the pressure of the metal wrapping the stick with no other parts, so it seems like it would have fallen off at some point, but in my case it was pretty early in the life of the rake, only a couple months in with occasional use. It was light weight, that was nice.
customer_reviews.author: csdev

customer_reviews.title: Works but not very heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: It's a good rake but if you plan on using it for super heavy duty work you might want to get a higher quality rake.
customer_reviews.author: Arielle Hampton

customer_reviews.title: Wrong item
customer_reviews.text: Lol. I laughed when I saw it was a handle sticking out of a box. I nearly died when I noticed that the rake I ordered was a shovel. We will see if they can fix this. Rofl. Edit: very fast turnaround on replacement. If things go smooth, I will up it again.
customer_reviews.author: Belgerith

customer_reviews.title: Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Head fell off during second use leveling mulch. Light use both times. Garbage. Unfortunatley it is past the return period for this junk.
customer_reviews.author: GardeningGoddess

customer_reviews.title: Spend a couple extra bucks on a quality rake
customer_reviews.text: This is not something I would consider a quality tool. If you take one look at the welds that hold the head together, you can see how poorly this is constructed. Also I don’t know where the Ames name comes from because mine is unbranded and stamped “made in China”
customer_reviews.author: Jared Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Good until it lasted (for about a month)
customer_reviews.text: Good until it lasted (for about a month). Very cheap materials. The steel was un-welded and the wood-to-metal connection came apart.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: Good rake would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Got the rake on time. The quality is good and heavy duty. It's not overly long so if you are taller it gets to be a chore being bent over raking after awhile. But it does the job and was a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Jason McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple tool. They built it correctly. It works as it should. I don't know how it could be better.
customer_reviews.author: BryLock

customer_reviews.title: great for yard work
customer_reviews.text: needed this to rake up a very large amount of leaves, perfect
customer_reviews.author: Keighyla

customer_reviews.title: Use it to drag small things across the ground without bending over
customer_reviews.text: This is a rake. The wooden part is satisfactory. Features: - straight - smooth The metal part is also satisfactory. Features: - curved - pointy This product rakes. There are no surprises here.

customer_reviews.title: Would not reccomend
customer_reviews.text: The handle snapped away from the teeth the first time I tried to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Won't be a return customer
customer_reviews.text: Rake broke first day of use. The actual metal rake threw off has my wife was using it. I won't be returning it because they need my money to make their product a better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin L.

customer_reviews.title: already knowing that this is not the strongest garden rake ...
customer_reviews.text: already knowing that this is not the strongest garden rake, I used gorilla glue and I will run a bolt or a screw into the metal ferrule (area were metal and handle meet also area that I poured glue into).
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: As advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Love the mop! What it didn't tell you was that it came with two scrub brushes and plenty of mop pads! Easy assembly and great customer service rep (Jennifer) that sends updates! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Bo Lathrop

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality at a very low price. I don't use much, so glad to not have to pay much.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Strong rake for clearing out debris and breaking up hardened soil.
customer_reviews.text: Needed a strong rake to break up blocks of hardened soil and clear out debris. Worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had used a weed killer and a lawn fertilizer ...
customer_reviews.text: I had used a weed killer and a lawn fertilizer on our yard. Bought home in December. Lawn needed care. Purchased this rake. I am 69 years old / can't put a lot of pressure on a rake. The head of rake came off in about 30 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Wes Narver

customer_reviews.title: Good enough rake.
customer_reviews.text: Handle will not hold up for heavy work. Had light work for the garden. Sharp enough. Worked fine. Very good price point. Prime delivered in a couple days. Worked fine. I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: DT Biggie

customer_reviews.title: The joint from the rake and wooden is  it good.
customer_reviews.text: Metal rake portion pulled out of the handle after a couple uses. The joint from the rake and wooden is not very good. Frustrating...

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: As expected and a great price. Never dreamed of ordering lawn care items but will do it again!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Defntely a light use rake
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely a light use rake. I was using it to move around rock and quickly realized this handle was going to come off.
customer_reviews.author: J. Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Works well in the garden, backyard, and mulching area. Great value.

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and great for yard work
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and great for yard work! We live in Arizona and I needed something that would pull the weeds out of the rocks and this was perfect

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Owned this rake for about 6 weeks and it has already broke. We haven't used it for anything other than typical garden/yard work. The metal broke not the wood handle.

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE MY RAKE!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 55, in ok shape... woman. This rake is light in the handle, and is a gem to work with. Ladies you will love it, or even smaller people. Not a peice of junk. I've been using it since it arrived. Does not make me tired, at all. I'm just moved onto family land that has been neglected for thirty years. I will be using this rake until I, or it breaks. Most likely me first. It came well packaged and arrived very quickly. Thank you for a wonderful this rake!

customer_reviews.title: The war continues with a new General
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied with this purchase. The sale price was great. The reviews were accurate. Moreover the product "feels" sturdy. This bow rake replaces one purchased 30 years ago so I was most concerned with quality. The task at hand is the slow removal of English ivy. My war against the English has been long and hard. The previous rake was ambushed and the handle was separated from body before anything could be done. So far the new "general" has performed well.

customer_reviews.text: As the old axiom goes, the right tool for the job. A bow rake will make you life so much easier if you keep chickens or other outdoor poultry. It makes raking both hay and wood shavings from the pen so much easier. Also if you have mowed long grass, it makes raking up the clipping much easier vs using a regular rake. Overall the design is very sturdy and the tines are holding up well. Glad I bought it.

product_meta.title: True Temper 1881600 14-Tine Bow Rake, 48-Inch, Blue
product_meta.description:
The True Temper eagle bow rake is perfect for loosening or breaking up compacted soil, spreading mulch or other material evenly and leveling areas before planting. It can also be used to collect leaves, hay, grass or other garden debris. Features one piece 14 inch forged tempered steel rake head, 48 inch handle and steel ferrule for strongest blade and handle connection.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
All gardening tools are not created equal. And what you really need is not only the right tool for the right job, but also something that's right for you too. Smaller and lighter tools for smaller hands. Ergonomic tools designed to reduce stress on the back, muscles and joints. Rugged tools for the professional user. Even lil' (but always genuine) tools for your lil' helpers.
feature_bullets: Steel ferrule for strongest blade and handle connection
Perfect for lossening, breaking up, or spreading material evenly before planting

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars297 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
